passiveList.desc:
If target has [ThreeMirrorpartYiSang], inflict +1 more [Combustion] Potency and [Sinking] Potency with this unit's Base Attack Skills (up to a total of 8 additional Potency per turn)
For every enemy killed due to [Combustion] damage, gain a "DMG Up" next turn for a random Attack Type (3 per turn; randomized for each instance)
passiveList.name: Skyweaving
